title: German Gill sans, with diamond dots and a unique g
content:
Hello,  
I love this typeface. Is anybody here able to identify it ?

Cheers,  
L.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820060519im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeface_6188.png)
author: laurent

comments.content: Part of the /g (of course...), it looks like [P22 Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820060519/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/underground-pro).

Yes indeed,  
P22 Underground is one of my all time favorites, but that but that g !
